summary: This bill, the Nulhegan River and Paul Stream Wild and Scenic River Study Act of 2025, proposes an amendment to the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act.  It directs a study of the Nulhegan River and Paul Stream in Vermont to evaluate potential additions to the national wild and scenic rivers system, including specific segments and associated tributaries. The Secretary of the Interior is tasked with completing the study and reporting its findings to Congress within three years of funding availability.
